@FXG_Team

Thanks so much for the upload, the only problem i had was that i am on my university network and they were contacted by MediaSentry on behalf of Paramount Pictures under

'Unauthorized Distribution of the Copyrighted Motion Picture Entitled
       The Fighter' 

There's NOTHING they can really do to anyone else but i would advise that if anyone on a University Network wait until they go home as i have been banned from the internet and had a disciplinary hearing. 

Thanks anyway i still watched it. A/9 V/9 M/9
